DeconsolidationGainOrLossAmount.description: Amount of gain (loss) from deconsolidation of subsidiary and derecognition of group of assets constituting transfer of business or nonprofit activity, excluding conveyance of oil and gas mineral rights and transfer of good or service in contract with customer.

DeferredPolicyAcquisitionCosts.label: Deferred Policy Acquisition Cost
DeferredPolicyAcquisitionCosts.description: Amount of deferred policy acquisition cost capitalized on contract remaining in force.

DerivativeCostOfHedgeNetOfCashReceived.label: Derivative, Cost of Hedge Net of Cash Received
DerivativeCostOfHedgeNetOfCashReceived.description: The premium (cost) of a hedge, net of any cash received on settlement during the period.

DueFromRelatedPartiesCurrent.label: Due from Related Parties, Current
DueFromRelatedPartiesCurrent.description: The aggregate amount of receivables to be collected from related parties where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth, at the financial statement date. which are usually due within one year (or one business cycle).

EmployeeBenefitsAndShareBasedCompensatio.label: Employee Benefits and Share-based Compensation
EmployeeBenefitsAndShareBasedCompensatio.description: Amount of expense for employee benefit and equity-based compensation.

EquityMethodInvestmentOwnershipPercentag.label: Equity Method Investment, Ownership Percentage
EquityMethodInvestmentOwnershipPercentag.description: The percentage of ownership of common stock or equity participation in the investee accounted for under the equity method of accounting.

FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInpu.label: Fair Value, Measurement with Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Recurring Basis, Asset, Period Increase (Decrease)
FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInpu.description: Amount of increase (decrease) of financial instrument classified as an asset measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInpu.label: Fair Value, Measurement with Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Recurring Basis, Asset, Purchases
FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInpu.description: Amount of purchases of financial instrument classified as an asset measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

FilmMonetizedOnItsOwnAmortizationExpense.label: Film, Monetized on Its Own, Amortization Expense
FilmMonetizedOnItsOwnAmortizationExpense.description: Amount of amortization expense for capitalized film cost for film predominantly monetized on its own.

ImpairedAssetsToBeDisposedOfByMethodOthe.label: Impaired Assets to be Disposed of by Method Other than Sale, Amount of Impairment Loss
ImpairedAssetsToBeDisposedOfByMethodOthe.description: Loss recognized as a result of the initial and subsequent write-down of a long-lived asset's carrying amount to fair value.

ImpairmentOfIntangibleAssetsExcludingGoo.label: Impairment of Intangible Assets (Excluding Goodwill)
ImpairmentOfIntangibleAssetsExcludingGoo.description: The amount of impairment loss recognized in the period resulting from the write-down of the carrying amount of an intangible asset (excluding goodwill) to fair value.

ImpairmentOfIntangibleAssetsIndefiniteli.label: Impairment of Intangible Assets, Indefinite-lived (Excluding Goodwill)
ImpairmentOfIntangibleAssetsIndefiniteli.description: Amount of impairment loss resulting from write-down of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance and having a projected indefinite period of benefit to fair value.

ImpairmentOfInvestments.label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments
ImpairmentOfInvestments.description: The amount by which the fair value of an investment is less than the amortized cost basis or carrying amount of that investment at the balance sheet date and the decline in fair value is deemed to be other than temporary, before considering whether or not such amount is recognized in earnings or other comprehensive income.

ImpairmentOfLeasehold.label: Impairment of Leasehold
ImpairmentOfLeasehold.description: The adjustment to reduce the value of existing agreements that specify the lessee's rights to use the leased property. This expense is charged when the estimates of future profits generated by the leased property are reduced.

ImpairmentOfLongLivedAssetsHeldForUse.label: Impairment of Long-Lived Assets Held-for-use
ImpairmentOfLongLivedAssetsHeldForUse.description: The aggregate amount of write-downs for impairments recognized during the period for long lived assets held for use (including those held for disposal by means other than sale).

ImpairmentOfLongLivedAssetsToBeDisposedO.label: Impairment of Long-Lived Assets to be Disposed of
ImpairmentOfLongLivedAssetsToBeDisposedO.description: The aggregate amount of write-downs for impairments recognized during the period for long-lived assets held for abandonment, exchange or sale.

IncomeLossFromEquityMethodInvestments.label: Income (Loss) from Equity Method Investments
IncomeLossFromEquityMethodInvestments.description: Amount of income (loss) for proportionate share of equity method investee's income (loss).

IncomeLossFromSubsidiariesNetOfTax.label: Income (Loss) from Subsidiaries, Net of Tax
IncomeLossFromSubsidiariesNetOfTax.description: Amount after tax of income (loss) of subsidiary attributable to the parent entity.

IncrementalCommonSharesAttributableToWri.label: Incremental Common Shares Attributable to Dilutive Effect of Written Put Options
IncrementalCommonSharesAttributableToWri.description: Additional shares included in the calculation of diluted EPS as a result of the potentially dilutive effect of outstanding written put options using the reverse treasury stock method.

IndefinitelivedIntangibleAssetsAcquired.label: Indefinite-lived Intangible Assets Acquired
IndefinitelivedIntangibleAssetsAcquired.description: Amount of increase in assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with an indefinite life, from an acquisition.

InventoryGross.label: Inventory, Gross
InventoryGross.description: Gross amount, as of the balance sheet date, of merchandise, goods, commodities, or supplies held for future sale or to be used in manufacturing, servicing or production process.

InvestmentsInAffiliatesSubsidiariesAssoc.label: Investments in and Advance to Affiliates, Subsidiaries, Associates, and Joint Ventures
InvestmentsInAffiliatesSubsidiariesAssoc.description: Amount of investment in equity method investee and investment in and advance to affiliate.

LegalFees.label: Legal Fees
LegalFees.description: The amount of expense provided in the period for legal costs incurred on or before the balance sheet date pertaining to resolved, pending or threatened litigation, including arbitration and mediation proceedings.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, after Year Five
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease due after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Five
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Four
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Three
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LIFOInventoryAmount.label: LIFO Inventory Amount
LIFOInventoryAmount.description: The amount of LIFO (last in first out) inventory present at the reporting date when inventory is also valued using different valuation methods.

MarketDataRevenue.label: Market Data Revenue
MarketDataRevenue.description: Amount of revenue from market data services, including, but not limited to, information about current quotes and most recent prices for a specific security.

NetInvestmentIncome.label: Net Investment Income
NetInvestmentIncome.description: Amount, after investment expense, of income earned from investments in securities and real estate. Includes, but is not limited to, real estate investment, policy loans, dividends, and interest. Excludes realized gain (loss) on investments.

NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionAccountsR.label: Noncash or Part Noncash Acquisition, Accounts Receivable Acquired
NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionAccountsR.description: "The amount of accounts receivable that an Entity acquires in a noncash (or part noncash) acquisition. Noncash is defined as information about all investing and financing activities of an enterprise during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. ""Part noncash"" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period."

NoncontrollingInterestIncreaseFromSaleOf.label: Noncontrolling Interest, Increase from Sale of Parent Equity Interest
NoncontrollingInterestIncreaseFromSaleOf.description: Amount of increase in noncontrolling interest from sale of a portion of the parent's controlling interest.

OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAssetAmortizatio.label: Operating Lease, Right-of-Use Asset, Amortization Expense
OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAssetAmortizatio.description: Amount of amortization expense for right-of-use asset from operating lease.

OperatingLeasesIncomeStatementCarryingAm.label: Operating Leases, Income Statement, Carrying Amount at Lease Inception Exceeds Fair Value
OperatingLeasesIncomeStatementCarryingAm.description: This element represents the loss resulting from the amount by which the cost or carrying amount, if different, of an asset subject to an agreement classified as an operating lease, at the inception of a lease involving real estate, exceeds the fair value of the leased property.

OtherIncome.label: Other Income
OtherIncome.description: Amount of revenue and income classified as other.

OtherLongTermInvestments.label: Other Long-term Investments
OtherLongTermInvestments.description: Amount of long-term investments classified as other.

OtherRealEstate.label: Other Real Estate
OtherRealEstate.description: Carrying amount of other real estate not separately disclosed, including, but not limited to, real estate investments, real estate loans that qualify as investments in real estate, and premises that are no longer used in operations may also be included in real estate owned. This does not include real estate assets taken in settlement of troubled loans through surrender or foreclosure.

OtherReceivables.label: Other Receivables
OtherReceivables.description: Amount due from parties in nontrade transactions, classified as other.

OtherReceivablesNetCurrent.label: Other Receivables, Net, Current
OtherReceivablesNetCurrent.description: Amount, after allowance, of receivables classified as other, due within one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

PaymentsForProceedsFromBusinessesAndInte.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Businesses and Interest in Affiliates
PaymentsForProceedsFromBusinessesAndInte.description: The net cash outflow or inflow associated with the acquisition or sale of a business segment during the period.

PaymentsToAcquireLoansReceivable.label: Payments to Acquire Loans Receivable
PaymentsToAcquireLoansReceivable.description: The cash outflow for the purchase of loan receivable arising from the financing of goods and services.

ProceedsFromCustomers.label: Proceeds from Customers
ProceedsFromCustomers.description: Cash receipts from customers during the current period which are usually for sales of goods and services.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOrSaleOfEquity.label: Proceeds from Issuance or Sale of Equity
ProceedsFromIssuanceOrSaleOfEquity.description: The cash inflow from the issuance of common stock, preferred stock, treasury stock, stock options, and other types of equity.

ProceedsFromMinorityShareholders.label: Proceeds from Noncontrolling Interests
ProceedsFromMinorityShareholders.description: Amount of cash inflow from a noncontrolling interest. Includes, but is not limited to, purchase of additional shares or other increase in noncontrolling interest ownership.

ProceedsFromRelatedPartyDebt.label: Proceeds from Related Party Debt
ProceedsFromRelatedPartyDebt.description: The cash inflow from a long-term borrowing made from related parties where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth. Alternate caption: Proceeds from Advances from Affiliates.

ProductionCostsCumulative.label: Production Costs, Cumulative
ProductionCostsCumulative.description: The capitalized costs incurred (excluded from amortization), as of the date of the balance sheet, to operate and maintain wells and related equipment and facilities, including depreciation and applicable operating costs of support equipment and facilities and other costs of operating and maintaining those wells and related equipment and facilities. They become part of the cost of oil and gas produced. Examples of production costs (sometimes called lifting costs) are: costs of labor to operate the wells and related equipment and facilities; repairs and maintenance; materials, supplies, and fuel consumed and supplies utilized in operating the wells and related equipment and facilities; property taxes and insurance applicable to proved properties and wells and related equipment and facilities; severance taxes; some support equipment or facilities may serve two or more oil and gas producing activities and may also serve transportation, refining, and marketing activities. To the extent that the support equipment and facilities are used in oil and gas producing activities, their depreciation and applicable operating costs become exploration, development or production costs, as appropriate. Depreciation, depletion, and amortization of capitalized acquisition, exploration, and development costs are not production costs but also become part of the cost of oil and gas produced along with production (lifting) costs identified above.

ProductLiabilityContingencyThirdPartyRec.label: Product Liability Contingency, Third Party Recovery, Percentage
ProductLiabilityContingencyThirdPartyRec.description: Percentage of the estimated recovery from third parties recorded in the period pertaining to product liability damages from specified products.

PropertyManagementFeePercentFee.label: Property Management Fee, Percent Fee
PropertyManagementFeePercentFee.description: The percentage charged for managing real estate properties.

PublicUtilitiesApprovedEquityCapitalStru.label: Public Utilities, Approved Equity Capital Structure, Percentage
PublicUtilitiesApprovedEquityCapitalStru.description: Percentage of public utility's approved equity to capital, including debt and equity.

RegulatedOperatingRevenueSteam.label: Regulated Operating Revenue, Steam
RegulatedOperatingRevenueSteam.description: The amount of regulated steam operating revenues recognized during the period.

RelatedPartiesAmountInCostOfSales.label: Related Parties Amount in Cost of Sales
RelatedPartiesAmountInCostOfSales.description: Amount included in cost of sales related to transactions with related parties incurred and recorded in the statement of operations for the period.

RevenuesNetOfInterestExpense.label: Revenues, Net of Interest Expense
RevenuesNetOfInterestExpense.description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income after deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

SaleOfStockConsiderationReceivedPerTrans.label: Sale of Stock, Consideration Received Per Transaction
SaleOfStockConsiderationReceivedPerTrans.description: Amount of consideration received by subsidiary or equity investee in exchange for shares of stock issued or sold. Includes amount of cash received, fair value of noncash assets received, and fair value of liabilities assumed by the investor.

SecuritiesBorrowed.label: Securities Borrowed
SecuritiesBorrowed.description: Amount, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of securities borrowed from entities in exchange for collateral. Includes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Expected Volatility Rate
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The estimated measure of the percentage by which a share price is expected to fluctuate during a period. Volatility also may be defined as a probability-weighted measure of the dispersion of returns about the mean. The volatility of a share price is the standard deviation of the continuously compounded rates of return on the share over a specified period. That is the same as the standard deviation of the differences in the natural logarithms of the stock prices plus dividends, if any, over the period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Risk Free Interest Rate
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The risk-free interest rate assumption that is used in valuing an option on its own shares.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Non-Option Equity Instruments, Outstanding, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of equity instruments other than options outstanding, including both vested and non-vested instruments.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Grants in Period, Gross
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Gross number of share options (or share units) granted during the period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Period Increase (Decrease), Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Change in the weighted average exercise price of options outstanding.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Vested and Expected to Vest, Exercisable, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of fully vested and expected to vest exercisable options that may be converted into shares under option plan. Includes, but is not limited to, unvested options for which requisite service period has not been rendered but that are expected to vest based on achievement of performance condition, if forfeitures are recognized when they occur.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Vested and Expected to Vest, Exercisable, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Weighted-average exercise price, at which grantee can acquire shares reserved for issuance, for fully vested and expected to vest exercisable or convertible options. Includes, but is not limited to, unvested options for which requisite service period has not been rendered but that are expected to vest based on achievement of performance condition, if forfeitures are recognized when they occur.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangements by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Grants in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.description: Weighted average per share amount at which grantees can acquire shares of common stock by exercise of options.

UnrealizedGainLossOnDerivativesAndCommod.label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Derivatives and Commodity Contracts
UnrealizedGainLossOnDerivativesAndCommod.description: The net change in the difference between the fair value and the carrying value, or in the comparative fair values, of open derivatives, commodity, or energy contracts, held at each balance sheet date, that was included in earnings for the period.

GainLossOnInvestments.label: Gain (Loss) on Investments
GainLossOnInvestments.description: Amount of realized and unrealized gain (loss) on investment.

NetInvestmentInLeasePurchase.label: Net Investment in Lease, Purchase
NetInvestmentInLeasePurchase.description: Amount of increase from purchase of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases.

ProceedsFromSaleAndCollectionOfNotesRece.label: Proceeds from Sale and Collection of Notes Receivable
ProceedsFromSaleAndCollectionOfNotesRece.description: The cash inflow associated with the proceeds from sale of notes receivable, as well as principal collections from a borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation (note receivable).

ProceedsFromSaleOfHeldToMaturitySecuriti.label: Proceeds from Sale of Held-to-maturity Securities
ProceedsFromSaleOfHeldToMaturitySecuriti.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of securities that had been designated as held-to-maturity. Excludes proceeds from maturities, prepayments and calls by the issuer.

RelatedPartyTransactionRate.label: Related Party Transaction, Rate
RelatedPartyTransactionRate.description: Identify the stated interest rate per the agreement, for example, leasing and debt arrangements between related parties.

SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Option, Nonvested, Weighted Average Exercise Price
SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Weighted average grant-date fair value of non-vested options outstanding.
